name: cnnrg

stmt.origin: mpbir2an(wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wcel(ccnfld, cngp), wcel(cabs, cfv(cabv, ccnfld)))
stmt.pretty: mpbir2an(CCfld ∈ NrmRing, CCfld ∈ NrmGrp, abs ∈(AbsVal ` CCfld))

body.origin:
|- wcel(ccnfld, cnrg)
-| wcel(ccnfld, cngp)
-| wcel(cabs, cfv(cabv, ccnfld))
-| wb(wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wa(wcel(ccnfld, cngp), wcel(cabs, cfv(cabv, ccnfld))))
body.pretty:
⊢ CCfld ∈ NrmRing
⊣ CCfld ∈ NrmGrp
⊣ abs ∈(AbsVal ` CCfld)
⊣ (CCfld ∈ NrmRing ↔(CCfld ∈ NrmGrp ∧ abs ∈(AbsVal ` CCfld)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(ccnfld, cnrg), wa(wcel(ccnfld, cngp), wcel(cabs, cfv(cabv, ccnfld))))
-| wceq(cabs, cfv(cnm, ccnfld))
-| wceq(cfv(cabv, ccnfld), cfv(cabv, ccnfld))
body.pretty:
⊢ (CCfld ∈ NrmRing ↔(CCfld ∈ NrmGrp ∧ abs ∈(AbsVal ` CCfld)))
⊣ abs =(norm ` CCfld)
⊣ (AbsVal ` CCfld)=(AbsVal ` CCfld)
